text:
EMR four properties

Wavelength: distance between crests
Frequency: number of crests per unit of time
Amplitude: heigth of each peak
Phase: angle of (mis)alignment between two waves

Stefanâ€“Boltzmann law

title: 2015896 - PERCEPCION REMOTA
text:
ğŸ“‘ Course Brief
Focus: the focus of this course is to develop conceptual and practical skills for using remote sensing analysis data in research.
How: reading, learning by doing and writing


ğŸ¯ Learning Objectives

Understand the physical principles of optical remote sensing.
Internalize the different stages of the remote sensing process and its usefulness in research.
Apply computational techniques to obtain information from Earth Observation data.


Select Academic Year/Term:
 2026
